I specifically bought this tablet for it: I specifically bought this tablet for its wireless feature. As a bonus, it also has a native Linux driver. My first laptop. It runs on a modest AMD: My first laptop. It runs on a modest AMD Ryzen 5 4600H and Nvidia GTX 1650. It is sufficient for what I do.
